deactivateAccount.title: Would you like to deactivate the {{email}} account?
deactivateAccount.description: The account will be deactivated and will no longer be able to connect to the application.

reactivateAccount.title: Would you like to reactivate the {{email}} account?
reactivateAccount.description: The account will be reactivated and will be able to connect to the application.

success.reactivateAccount: The account of {{email}} has been successfully reactivated.
success.deactivateAccount: The account of {{email}} has been successfully deactivated.
